text: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

translation.en.sahih: We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a tremendous Day.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus Nuh kepada kaumnya lalu ia berkata: "Wahai kaumku sembahlah Allah, sekali-kali tak ada Tuhan bagimu selain-Nya". Sesungguhnya (kalau kamu tidak menyembah Allah), aku takut kamu akan ditimpa azab hari yang besar (kiamat).
